  • Uses of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour

    Subinterfaces of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BehaviourModel
    Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means any references to state refers to current state, but any references to history refer to the previous state.

  • Uses of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.mechanics

    Classes in io.github.ai4ci.abm.mechanics with type parameters of type State
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X extends State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X>>
    This abstraction lets us have policy and behaviour models sharing the same state model framework, so outbreak and person updates can follow the same pattern.
    Subinterfaces of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.mechanics
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    StateMachine.BehaviourState
     
    static interface 
    StateMachine.PolicyState
     
    static interface 
    StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting
    Flags a behaviour model for not needing any testing or history updates.
    static interface 
    StateUtils.DoesPCRIfSymptomatic
    Flags a behaviour model as seeking (and performing) a PCR test if the person has been symptomatic for 2 days in a row and is compliant and has not had a test in a set number of days (regardless of test outcome).

    StateMachine.rememberCurrentState(State<?,?,?,?> state)
